metadata.title: NIST SP 800-171 DoD Assessment Scoring - Revision 3 Mapping
metadata.description: Maps DoD Assessment Methodology scoring to NIST 800-171 Revision 3 controls (97 active controls)
metadata.sourceDocument: NIST SP 800-171 DoD Assessment Methodology, Version 1.2.1, June 24, 2020
metadata.scoringMethod: Subtractive - Start at maxScore, subtract points for each non-compliant control
metadata.complianceTrigger: Control status must be 'Verified' to count as implemented (0 points deducted)
notes: Max score equals number of controls (97), matching DoD methodology where Rev 2 max = 110 controls
Score can go NEGATIVE - minimum possible is -195 (97 - 292 total weighted points)
Weighted points (1, 3, 5) are PENALTY values subtracted when controls are not verified
Basic Security Requirements are weighted 3-5 points (highest penalty)
Derived Security Requirements with exploitation potential are weighted 5 points
Derived Security Requirements with specific/confined effects are weighted 3 points
Other Derived Security Requirements are weighted 1 point
New Rev 3 controls scored using DoD methodology principles
Some controls have special conditional scoring (MFA, FIPS crypto)
System Security Plan (03.15.02) uses N/A scoring - absence prevents assessment

scoringRules.formula: 97 - SUM(dodPoints for each control where status != 'Verified')

implementationNotes.verifiedStatus: Control is fully implemented - 0 points deducted
implementationNotes.otherStatuses: Control NOT implemented - full dodPoints value deducted

conditions.scenario: MFA not implemented for any users
MFA implemented only for remote/privileged users (not general users)
Cryptography employed but NOT FIPS validated

notApplicableControls.title: Remote Access
notApplicableControls.condition: Remote access is not permitted AND policy exists to prevent inadvertent enablement
notApplicableControls.scoring: Do not deduct points if N/A with documented policy

notApplicableControls.title: Wireless Access
notApplicableControls.condition: Wireless access is not permitted AND policy exists to prevent inadvertent enablement
notApplicableControls.scoring: Do not deduct points if N/A with documented policy

notApplicableControls.title: Access Control for Mobile Devices
notApplicableControls.condition: Mobile device connection is not permitted AND policy exists to prevent inadvertent enablement
notApplicableControls.scoring: Do not deduct points if N/A with documented policy

notApplicableControls.title: System Security Plan
notApplicableControls.condition: This control is prerequisite for assessment
notApplicableControls.scoring: Absence results in 'assessment cannot be completed' finding, not point deduction
